description: In this episode of The Hindu Mind, JDU Working President Sanjay K. Jha makes bold revelations on Bihar’s political future. He shares how Nitish Kumar offered the CM post to BJP in 2020, discusses the impact of double-engine government, and explains why the 2025 election is about Bihar’s next 25 years. Jha also speaks on Nishant Kumar’s political role, electoral roll revision, and how women voters transformed Bihar’s politics. With a deep dive into governance, caste arithmetic, and alliances, this is a must-watch conversation ahead of the 2025 Bihar Assembly polls.

description: British tennis sensation Emma Raducanu, aged 22 in 2025, boasts a $15 million net worth, fueled by prize money and lucrative sponsorships from brands like Nike and Dior. Despite a fluctuating career since her historic 2021 US Open win, where she reached world no. 10, Raducanu continues to compete, reaching the third round of the 2025 Australian Open.

title: Jaden Agassi shares unseen photos with Catherine Holt, celebrates love
description: Jaden Agassi and Catherine Holt celebrated their three-year anniversary on September 20, 2025, sharing heartfelt messages and photos on Instagram. The couple, who adopted a French bulldog named Rocky in June, also attended the US Open women’s singles final.

title: H-1B visa hike: JPMorgan asks staff to return to US before Sept 21
description: JPMorgan and Microsoft are urging H-1B visa holders to return to the U.S. immediately due to President Trump's new directive imposing a $100,000 annual fee on companies for each H-1B worker. This move, effective September 21st, is anticipated to disproportionately impact Indian IT firms like Infosys and TCS, who heavily rely on H-1B visas to deploy professionals in the U.S.

title: Why Molly Qerim left First Take: ESPN cites contract, business factors
description: Molly Qerim's exit from ESPN's First Take wasn't due to controversy, but rather a planned transition as her contract neared expiration. ESPN aimed to broaden Qerim's role beyond the show, while financial considerations, particularly Stephen A. Smith's substantial contract, influenced the decision to seek a more cost-effective co-host. The network is now initiating a casting process to find Qerim's replacement.

title: Travis Hunter’s Father: Hidden confession to college choice; untold story behind Sanders move
description: Travis Hunter Jr., the top high school player in 2021, surprised everyone by choosing Jackson State against his father's wishes for Florida State or Georgia. Driven by his admiration for Deion Sanders, Hunter Jr. excelled at Jackson State before following Sanders to Colorado. He became a two-way star, mirroring Coach Prime's legacy, showcasing his talent on both offense and defense.

title: Haunted memory: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella at townhall; ‘one DEC still stays with me’
description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella expressed concerns about the company's future in the age of AI, citing the downfall of Digital Equipment Corporation (DEC) as a cautionary example. Nadella acknowledged a perceived lack of empathy within Microsoft's culture and pledged to rebuild trust with employees, following recent job cuts.
